name: Microzine 37
overview: Microzine issue number 37 contains 4 programs: The Case of the Cutting Caper, Math Mall, The Race for Independence, and Nutrition Explorer. From the Letter from the Editor: What's new in Microzine? Lots! We guarantee you'll have fun playing with this issue. And don't tell anyone, but you'll probably learn something too! Look at PROGRAMS on the Guide to see what each program is all about. "Nutrition Explorer" lets you examine the foods you eat. Do you think you eat a well balanced diet?
